Status

Show product image:
You can show your product thumb in the SEO schema markup

Show product review:
You can show your product review in the SEO schema markup

Show product SKU:
You can show your product SKU in the SEO schema markup

Show product price:
You can show your product price (with discount if any) in the SEO schema markup

Show product stock:
You can show your product availability in the SEO schema markup. This will be based on stock status of the product
After this extension is enabled and configured, you can test your product pages with Schema.org validation tools

Description:
Select a description to use for structural data. Automatic mode will select blurb if available, otherwise, product description will be used

Blurb
Description

Groq API Key:
Enter your Groq API key for AI-powered content generation. Get one at groq.com

AI Model:
Select the Groq AI model for content generation. Llama-3.1-8b-instant is recommended for speed, Llama-3.3-70b-versatile for quality

Enable AI Auto-Generation:
Automatically improve product descriptions using AI when Schema.org markup is generated

Enable Product Variants (hasVariant):
Generate Schema.org hasVariant markup from AbanteCart product options for better SEO

Enable FAQ Schema:
Generate FAQPage structured data for products to enhance search results with FAQ snippets

Enable HowTo Schema:
Generate HowTo structured data for products with usage instructions

Enable Review Schema:
Generate Review structured data for enhanced product ratings in search results

Enable Organization Schema:
Include Organization structured data to identify your business in search results

AI Temperature:
Controls AI creativity (0.0-1.0). Lower values = more focused, higher values = more creative. Default: 0.7

Max Tokens:
Maximum length of AI-generated content. Default: 200 tokens (~150 words)

API Timeout (seconds):
Maximum time to wait for AI response. Default: 10 seconds

Auto-Generate FAQ:
Use AI to automatically create FAQ content based on product information

FAQ Questions Count:
Number of FAQ questions to generate automatically. Default: 3

Auto-Generate HowTo:
Use AI to create HowTo instructions for product usage

HowTo Steps Count:
Number of steps to generate in HowTo instructions. Default: 5

Auto-Generate Reviews:
Create technical reviews using AI for products without existing reviews

Minimum Review Rating:
Minimum rating for auto-generated reviews (1-5). Default: 4

Maximum Review Rating:
Maximum rating for auto-generated reviews (1-5). Default: 5

Organization Logo URL:
Full URL to your organization's logo for Schema.org markup

Contact Type:
Primary contact type for your organization in structured data

Organization Phone:
Main phone number for customer contact in international format (+1-555-123-4567)

Debug Mode:
Enable debugging output for Schema.org generation (for developers only)

Log AI API Calls:
Log all AI API requests and responses for monitoring and debugging
